actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize testimony by and representation of former employee of the Senate in United States v. Peter MacDonald, Jr., et al.

summary.text: Authorizes: (1) Kenneth M. Ballen and any other employee or former employee of the Senate to testify in United States v. Peter MacDonald, Jr., et al; and (2) the Senate Legal Counsel to represent him and any other Senate employee in connection with their testimony in such case.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony by and representation of former employee of the Senate in United States v. Peter MacDonald, Jr., et al.
